name: Directory Naming
description:
The Naming subproject will will contain common JNDI code along with various JNDI providers. 

Currently, Naming includes an in-memory JNDI service provider that was extracted from the Jakarta Tomcat JNDI implementation. See Using for a description of how to configure the JNDI provider or to use the JNDI resource factories (JDBC Datasources, JavaMail Sessions, EJB References, Java Beans) that are provided with Naming.
